explanation_of_categorization: All files represent routine operational maintenance
reason_for_change: Continuous improvement, operational maintenance, and security enhancement

changed_files_detailed.diff:
diff --git a/.github/workflows/FedRAMP 20x CLI Validation Pipeline.yaml b/.github/workflows/FedRAMP 20x CLI Validation Pipeline.yaml
index 04731f4..48a1f7e 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/FedRAMP 20x CLI Validation Pipeline.yaml	
+++ b/.github/workflows/FedRAMP 20x CLI Validation Pipeline.yaml	
@@ -1445,7 +1445,7 @@ jobs:
           
           git add .
           git commit -m "🤖 Secure sync: KSI + SCN + Phase2 compliance ($TIMESTAMP)$KSI_STATUS$SCN_STATUS$SECURITY_STATUS$PHASE2_STATUS" || echo "No changes to sync"
-          git push origin main
+          git push origin master
           
           echo "✅ Public repository sync complete with secure hybrid structure + Phase 2 compliance"
           echo ""
@@ -1570,3 +1570,4 @@ jobs:
 
 
 
+
